content.content: Hello everybody, Looking for feedback on this:   github.com/ethereum/EIPs      Issue: Non-Fungible Token State Verification (for exchanges)  	 	opened by mg6maciej 	on 2018-06-24 	 	 	  Motivation This is to start a discussion on secure exchange of NFTs, as there are potential problems with front running, where seller...        Cheers, Maciej
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is asking for feedback on a proposal related to Non-Fungible Token State Verification. The post is open for discussion and the author is seeking constructive criticism.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
